classification.rationale: This job description is for a Front-End Engineer role, focusing on UI/UX, software development with frameworks like Vue and React, and utilizes cloud platforms and standard programming languages. It does not mention any generative AI technologies, LLMs, or AI-specific modeling tasks, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer profile.
